Translations.Text: Ana akuwusyana ya chichi
Ya abali jekulungwa (ja Kiyama)
Jaakuŵa ŵanganyao pa jalakwejo ali nkutindana
Ngwamba! Sampano chaimanye (isyesyene yakwe)
Soni ngwamba! Sampano chaimanye (isyesyene yakwe)
Ana nganituliŵika litaka kuŵa chakutandika
Matumbi ni kuŵa ichili
Ni tun'gumbile ŵanganyammwe mitundu jiŵili (achalume ni achakongwe)
Soni tuluŵisile lugono lwenu kuŵa kupumula (kwa ilu yenu)
Ni tuchiŵisile chilo kuŵa chiwaalo (pakusiŵilila ilu yenu ni chipi chakwe)
Ni tuuŵisile muusi kuŵa ndema jakupalila
Ni tutaŵile pachanya penu (mawunde) nsano nagaŵili gakulimbangana
Soni tuŵisile (kwalakweko) nyali jaakolela kusyene (lyuŵa)
Ni tutulwisye kuumila m’mawunde gawula mesi gakugwa mwamachili
Kuti tukopochesye mbeju ni mmela
Kwisa soni migunda jetotekane (nyambi sya itela)
Chisimu Lisiku Lyachiilanyo liŵele lyana ndema jakwe jisyesyene
Lisiku lya chiiligombedwa lipenga, mwanti ŵanganyammwe chinchiikanganaga mikutula-mikutula
Ni lichiugulidwa liwunde, mwanti lichiŵa milango-milango
Nombe matumbi gachityosyedwa m’mangwakwe, mwanti gachiŵa lunyisinyisi
Chisimu Jahannama jikuŵa nkwajembecheya (ŵakulemwa)
Kwa ŵakusumba mpika gaŵele malo gakuujila
Tachiŵa nkutama mwalakwemo yaka-yaka
Ngasapasya mwalakwemo kusisimila namuno yakumwa (yakumasya njota)
Ikaŵeje mesi gamasemule nnope ni uwowu
(Kuŵa) malipilo gakulandanila (ni masengo gao)
Chisimu ŵanganyao ŵaliji ali ngaakwembecheya ya chiŵalanjilo
Ni ŵaikaaniile imanyilo Yetu naikanilape
Soni chindu chilichose tuchisunjile paachilemba m’Chitabu
Basi pasyani; mwanti ngatun'jonjechesya (inepe) ikaŵeje ilagasyo (pachanya pa ilagasyo)
Chisimu ŵaoga (wakun’jogopa Allah) akwete kupata malo ga kupunda (ku Mbepo)
Matimbe gana uŵigo ni itela ya zabibu
Ni ŵaali ŵangagwa maŵele ŵakulandana misingu
Kwisa soni ipanda yachigumbalile
Ngasaja kupikana mwalakwemo yangali mate atamuno unami
(Aga ni) malipilo gakuumila kwa Ambuje ŵenu (Allah), ntuuka wakwana
M'mbuje jwa kumawunde ni petaka ni yaili chilikati chakwe, Jwaukoto wejinji. Pangali ŵachachikola machili gakuŵecheta Najo
Lisiku lyatiuchijima Nsimu (Jibulilu) pamo ni Achimalaika m’misela; ngasaŵecheta (jwalijose) ikaŵeje jwatachipedwa lusa ni (Allah) Jwaukoto wejinji, ni tachiŵecheta yakulungamika
Lyele ni Lisiku lyakuonaonape, basi jwaakusaka aliikolochesye chilepe malo gakuujila kwa M'mbujegwe (Allah)
Chisimu Uwwe tukuntetela chilepe ya ilagasyo yakuŵandika. Lisiku lyataachiiwona mundu yagaalongwesye makono gakwe, nitachiŵecheta kafili kuti: “Nkongwene! Bola ningaliji litaka.”
Ngwaalumbila (Achimalaika) ŵaakuchuŵaga (mitima ja makafili) mwamachili
Ngwaalumbila soni (Achimalaika) ŵaakutyosyaga (mitima ja ŵandu ŵakulupilila) mwambolembole
Nguilumbila soni yaying'ambila mwangalechesya (munnengaleenga, mpela Achimalaika ni ndondwa)
Ni ŵaakutendesyana mpikisano (pakwanilisya malamusi ga Allah)
Ni (Achimalaika) ŵaakuŵalaganya malamusi (ga Allah pakugaŵika m’mangwakwe)
Lisiku lyalichigombedwa lipenga lyandanda (lyaliichitenganya chilichose ni kuwa)
Lichilikuichisya lipenga lyaaŵili (yosope yene nikwimuka ni kola umi)
Lyele lisikulyo mitima (jine) jichitetemela ni woga
Meso ga (achinsyene) mitimajo gachiteteŵala
(Makafili) gakasatiji: “Ana uwwe yakuona chachituuchisya mukaŵe ketu kakala (nikuŵa niumi soni)
Kutendaga uwwe tuli maupa gepukuswe-pukuswe?”
Ŵatite (mwachisyawumi ni mwakuchindimbula): “Nakuŵaga kwele kuujilaako kusyene, basi kuchiŵa kuujila kwachasiko (kwangali ukoto kukwetu).”
Chisimu walakweo ni n'gumiilo umpepe
Basi ajile sayi ŵanganyao tachigamba kuona ali pachanya petaka
Ana jinyyiche abali ja Musa
Pandema jaŵam'bilaasile Ambujegwe (Allah) pachiŵata chakutakata (chakuŵilanjikwa) Tuwaa
(Nikuntenda kuti): Jaawulani kwa Firiauna, chisimu jwalakwejo jusumbile mpika
Ni nkajile: “Ana nkusaka kuti n'diiswejesye?”
“Ni nan'jongolele kwa Ambuje ŵenu kuti mwaajogopeje?”
Basi niŵannosisye chisimosimo chekulungwa
Nambo jwaakaaniile nikunyosya
Kaneka jwachitundumalile (chikulupi) aku junankulimbichila (kwasiŵilila ŵandu kwa Allah)
Basi jwaasonganganyisye (asaŵi) nikwaŵilanga (ŵandu)
Ni jwatite: “Une ni nam'mbuje gwenu jwapenani kusyene!”
Basi Allah ni ŵankwembekenye ni ipotesi ligongo lya maloŵe gakwe gambesi ni gandanda
Chisimu mu yalakweyi mwana chaamuko kwa mundu jwaakun'jogopa (Allah)
Ana ŵanganyammwe niŵakusausya nnope kagumbidwe (kenu) kapena liwunde lyaŵalitaŵile
Ŵalinyakwile nsingu wakwe nikulikolosya
Ni ŵachiunichile chilo chakwe (nichipi) nikulikoposya lilanguka lyakwe (muusi)
Nombe litaka panyuma payalakweyo ŵalitandiche
Ŵakopwesye mwalakwemo mesi gakwe ni mopo wakwe
Nombe matumbi ŵagasimiiche
(Kuŵa) yakunsengwasya ŵanganyammwe ni ilango yenu
Basi ndema jaliichiika likungu lyekulungwa nnope (Kiyama)
Lyele lisikulyo mundu tachikumbuchila yaŵapanganyisye
Nombe Moto Waukali wuchiŵichidwa palangulangu kwa nkulola (jwalijose)
Sano mundu jwaŵasumbile mpika
Ni kulongosya umi wa duniya
Chisimu Moto Waukali basi ni liuto lyakwe
Sano jwaakogopa kuti tachija kwima pameso pa Ambujegwe (Allah), nikuwukanyaga ntima ku isako yakusakala
Chisimu Litimbe lya ku Mbepo basi ni liuto lyakwe
Akum'buusya (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) ya ndema (jakwichila Kiyama kuti): “Jichiŵa chakachi?”
Mmwe nganinkola umanyilisi wanti nikujitomeka
Kwa Ambuje ŵenupe (Allah) ni kuchipelela kwakwe (kwa umanyilisi wa Kiyama)
Mmwe masengo genu ni kwaatetela ŵaakujijogopa (Kiyamajo)
Chisimu ŵanganyao lisiku lyatachijiona (Kiyamajo) tachiŵa nti chisawu nganatama (pa duniya) ikaŵeje ligulo limo kapena kundaŵi kwakwe
Jwautile sinya (Muhammadi ﷺ) ni kulola kumbali
Ligongo lyakum’bichiilila jwangalola
Ana chichi chachimmanyisye kuti mwine jwalakwejo kuŵa nkuliswejesya (ku ilemwa)
Mwine chakumbuchile, basi nikunkamuchisya kumbuchilako
Nambo mundu jwaliweni kusichila
Basi jwalakwejo mmwe ni nkunkosoŵalila
Pangalitu ulemwa kukwenu naga ngaakuliswejesya (ku ukafili)
Nambo mundu jwam’bichilile aku juchikangamalaga
Soni jwalakwejo ali nkun'jogopa (Allah)
Basi ya jwalakwejo mmwe ni nkuikwanjila
Ngwamba (ngasintenda iyyo)! Chisimu galakwe (ma Ȃyaga) gaŵele chikumbusyo
Basi jwaakusaka talikumbusye najo (Qur’anijo)
(Jili) mu ikalakala yakuchimbichikwa
Yapenani, yakuswejesyedwa
Ili m’makono mwa akulemba (Achimalaika)
Ŵakuchimbichika, ŵaakunda (malamusi)
Pamasile palaniwe mundu (kafili), kanila kwakwe kwalakweku ni kwantiuli
Ana an'gumbile kuumila mu chinduchi
Kuumila m’mesi (gaŵalume ni ŵakongwe) an'gumbile, ni kumpanjila mpango (wakagumbidwe kakwe)
Kaneka naakun'jepepachisyaga litala (lyakopochela ku duniya)
Kaneko nakasampaga chiwa ni kunsiika m’malembe
Soni patachisakapo tachinsyusya
Ngwamba! Chisimu (kafili) nganakwanilisyepe yannamwile (Allah)
Basi achetelele mundu ya yakulya yakwe
Chisimu Uwwe tukasakusula mesi (gawula) mwamachili
Kaneka ni tukasaligangaga litaka kuliganga kusyene
Ni tukasakoposya mwalakwemo songolo
Kwisa soni isogosi ya zabibu ni maupulu (gakulya ilango)
Ni kwisa soni isogosi ya zaituni (yakwenga mauta) ni itela yatende
Ni migunda jaitela yejinji
Kwisa soni isogosi (yamitundu mitundu) ni mopo
(Kuŵa) yakunsengwasya ŵanganyammwe ni ilango yenu
Basi ndema jaliichiika lipenga lyakusiŵa m’mawiwi (ligongo lya machili gakwe)
Lyele lisikulyo mundu tachatila achimwenegwe
Kwisa soni mamagwe ni babagwe
Ni kwisa soni ŵankwakwe ni ŵanache ŵakwe
Mundu jwalijose mwa ŵanganyao lyele lisikulyo tachikola yakunkwanila (kuntendekasya kuti akakosoŵalila ya jwine)
Ngope sine lyele lisikulyo sichiŵa syakumelemenda
Syakusechelela ni kusengwa (pakupikana yakuja ku Mbepo)
Sano ngope sine lyele lisikulyo sichipakala luwundu
Sichiŵa siunichilidwe ni chipi
Ŵanganyao ni ŵali achimakafili ŵakusakasya nnope
Pandema jalichikulunjidwa lyuŵa (nikutyoka lilanguka lyakwe)
Ni ndema jasichipatuka ndondwa
Ni ndema jagachijendesyedwa matumbi (paagachuŵa m’mangwakwe)
Ni ndema jasichilechedwa ngamiya syana maŵele gepele
Ni ndema jaichisonganganyisyidwa inyama yamwitinji
Ni ndema jasichikolesyedwa mbwani moto
Ni ndema jajichilumbikanyisyidwa mitima (ku ilu yakwe)
Ni ndema jachachiwusyidwa mwanache jwankwongwe jwaŵasichidwe ali jwaumi
Kuti ŵawulajidwe ni ulemwachi
Ni ndema jaichipindikulidwa ikalakala (mugalembedwe masengo gamundu)
Ni ndema jalichitandukulidwa liwunde
Ni ndema jauchikwisilidwa Moto Waukali
Ni ndema jajichiŵandichisyidwa Mbepo
Mundu jwalijose tachimanyilila yayiche nayo
Basi ngusilumbila ndondwa syasikusisika muusi
(Ni) syasikwendaga (chilo kaneka) ni kusisika pakutiŵila
Ni nguchilumbila soni chilo ndema jachikwika ni kutyoka
Ni ngukulumbila soni kumasikusiku ndema jakukulanguka
Chisimu aji (Qur’aniji) gaŵele maloŵe ga (kulungusyidwa ni) Ntenga Jwakuchimbichika (Jibulilu)
Nsyene machili, soni jwana uchimbichimbi wapenani kwa (Allah) Nsyene Arishi (Chindanda Chaulungu)
Jwakundidwa malamusi kwinaniko (ni Achimalaika) soni jwakulupichika
Soni Nnongo n'jenuju (Muhammadi ﷺ) nganaŵa jwamasoka
Soni chisimu chene (Muhammadi ﷺ) ŵam'bweni jwalakwe (Jibulilu mu kagumbidwe kakwe kasyesyene) kuchipelela chameso chakuonechela (cha ku ngopoko lyuŵa)
Soni jwalakwe nganijuŵa jwausuchi pa (umanyilisi wa) yakusisika
Soni aji (Qur’an) nganigaŵa maloŵe ga shetani jwakuŵinjidwa
Nambi kwapi nkuja
Nganijiŵa aji (Qur’an) ikaŵeje chikumbusyo cha iwumbe yosope
Kwa mundu jwaakusaka mwa jenumanja kuti ajongoche
Ni nganim'ba nsachile, ikaŵeje akasache kaje Allah M’mbuje jwa iwumbe yosope
Pandema jalichipasuka liwunde
Ni ndema jasichilakatika ndondwa
Ni ndema jasichigumuchila mbwani
Ni ndema jagachiukulidwa malembe
Mundu jwalijose juchimanyilila yajwalongwesye (kupanganya) ni yajwalesile munyuma
E mmwe amundu! Ana ni chichi chinnyenjile kwa (kwikanila kunnyosya) M’mbuje gwenu (Allah) Jwantuka wejinji
Ajula jwaŵan'gumbile, ni kunkolosya pa kunnandanya (iŵalo yenu) soni ni kun'golosya (nsingu wenu)
Mukawoneche kalikose kaŵasachile (kuti m'bonecheje) ŵampanganyisye
Ngwamba! Nambo kuti ŵanganyammwe nkukanila ya malipilo
Soni chisimu kwa jenumanja kwana (Achimalaika) ŵakunnolela (ni kusunga itendo yenu)
Ŵakuchimbichika, ŵakulemba
Akumanyilila yankuntenda
Chisimu atenda ngoto chachiŵa nchindimba (mu Mbepo Jakusengwasya)
Sano ŵandu ŵakusakasya nnope, chisimu chene tachiŵa m’Moto Waukali
Chachiujinjila Lisiku Lyamalipilo
Soni ŵanganyao ngasaŵa asoŵile mwalakwemo (pakopoka ata panandi)
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya Lisiku Lyamalipilo
Soni ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya Lisiku Lyamalipilo
Lyele ni lisiku lyangakola mundu chilichose chanti ni kunkamuchisya mundu jwine. Nombe ulamusi (wosope) lyele lisikulyo uchiŵa wa Allah pe
Ipotesi ni yao ŵakupuungusya (miliingo)
Aŵala ŵaakutiji naga ndema jaakulilinjila ku ŵandu (pakwasuma indu yao) akasaligumbachisyaga
Nambo pa ndema jaakwaaliinjila (ŵanduo) kapena kwapimila (pakwasumisya indu) akupungusyaga
Ana ngakuganisya ŵanganyao yanti chachiukulidwa (m’malembe)
Pa Lisiku Lyekulungwa nnope
Lisiku lyatachijima ŵandu pameso pa M’mbuje jwa iwumbe yosope
Yakuona! Chisimu yakulembedwa ya (masengo ga) ŵandu ŵakusakasya nnope ili mu Sijjin
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya Sijjin
Chele ni chitabu (chekulungwa) chachilembedwe (nkati mwakwe yakusakalape)
Ipotesi lyele lisikulyo taachiipata ŵakanila
Aŵala ŵakukanila ya Lisiku Lyamalipilo
Ni pangali jwampaka alikanile lyalakwelyo ikaŵeje jwalijose jwakusumba mpika jwasambi syejinji
Pandema jakusoomedwa kukwakwe ma Ȃya Getu akasatiji: “Asi ni adisiadisi sya ŵandu ŵandanda.”
Ngwamba! Nambo kuti m’mitima mwao mwana nkuwo wa (ilemwa) yaaŵele ali nkupanganya
Yakuona! Chisimu ŵanganyao lyele lisikulyo kwa M’mbuje gwao (Allah) tachisiŵilidwa (mwanti ngaaja kum’bona)
Kaneka chisimu ŵanganyao tachiujinjila Moto Waukali
Kaneko ni kuchiŵechetedwa kuti: “Ayi ni ayilayila yamwaliji nkuikanila.”
Yakuona! Chisimu yakulembedwa ya (masengo ga) atenda ngoto ili mu Illiyyun
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya Illiyyun
Chalakwecho ni chitabu (chekulungwa) chachilembedwe (nkati mwakwe yambonepe)
Akuchiŵichilaga umboni (Achimalaika) ŵaŵandichisyidwe (kwa Allah)
Chisimu atenda ngoto tachiŵa m’chindimba (mu Mbepo Jakusengwasya)
Ali pachanya pa indanda yetandiche chenene aku achilolaga (ku chindimba chaŵapele ni kum'bona soni Allah)
Tinchikumanyilila pangope syao kumelemenda kwa chindimba
Takamwesyedweje nkologo wambone nnope wesiŵe (ni isiŵilo yakulimbangana)
Kumbesi kwa kumwako (chikukanunjileje luwumba lwa) miski. Sano kuti akaipate yele basi apikisane akupikisana (pakutenda yambone)
Soni chakuwanganyichisya chakwe (nkologowo chigakaŵe) mesi gakuumila mu Tasnim
Jwalakwejo ni tutumule jwachakamweje (ŵandu) ŵakuŵandichisyidwa (kwa Allah)
Chisimu (ku duniya) ŵandu ŵaŵanneŵele (Allah) ŵaliji nkwaseka ŵandu ŵakulupilila
Mwanti ndema jaŵaliji nkupita (ŵakulupililao) paali ŵanganyao ŵaliji nkukupililana meso (mwakuchembulusya)
Sano naga atite agalauche kuja kwaachin'jao ŵagalaukaga ali nkusengwa (ligongo lya kuchembulusya kwao)
Soni naga ali ŵawenimo ŵatiji: “Chisimu ŵanganyaŵa ni ŵali ŵakupotela nnope.”
Nambotu (achimakafilio) nganatumisyidwa kuŵa ŵakwalolela (Asilamu nikusunga itendo yao)
Nambo lelojino (lisiku lya Kiyama) ŵandu ŵaŵakulupilile chaŵe ali nkugaseka makafili
Ali pachanya pa indanda yetandiche chenene aku achigalolaga (makafiligo galinkulagasika)
Ana alipiidwe achimakafili pa yaŵaliji nkutenda
Pandema jalichipapuka liwunde
Ni kwisa kunda lilamusi lya M’mbujeegwe, soni liichiŵajilwa (kuti likunde)
Ni ndema jalichijasyisyidwa litaka (pakusyaga matumbi ni ikwesya)
Ni kwisa kuponya kusa (litakalyo) yayaliji nkati mwakwe nikuŵa mwangali chachipali
Ni kwisa kunda lilamusi lya M’mbujeegwe, soni liichiŵajilwa (kuti likunde)
E mmwe amundu! Chisimutu mmwe nkukangamala wa kwa Ambuje ŵenu (Allah) nchilimbichilaga (kutenda itendo yambone kapena yakusakala), basi ni tinchisimangana nayo (pa lisiku lya Kiyamalyo)
Sano mundu jwatachipedwa chitabu chakwe ku nkono wakwe wan'dyo
Basi jwalakwe tachiŵalanjidwa kuŵalanjidwa kwakwepepala
Soni ni tachiujila kwa achalongo achin'jakwe ali jwakusengwa
Nambo mundu jwatachipedwa chitabu chakwe cha kunyuma kwa n'gongo wakwe
Basi jwalakwe, tachichiŵilanga chonasiko (kuti bola agambe kuwa, nambo ngasiyikomboleka)
Ni tachijinjila ku Moto Wakulapuka
Chisimu jwalakwe jwaliji jwakusengwa (pajwaliji) ni achalongo achin'jakwe (ku duniya)
Chisimu jwalakwe jwasimichisyaga kuti ngasaujila (kwa Allah)
Elo! Chisimu Ambujegwe ŵaliji ali nkunnolechesya
Basi ngukulumbila kuchejela kwegulo
Kwisa soni chilo ni yachikusonganganyaga
Ni mwesi ndema jaukwanila lilanguka (lyakwe)
Chisimu ŵanganyammwe chinsimanganeje nako kaŵe kane kutyochela pa kaŵe kane (paumi wa duniya uno mpaka kwa Akhera)
Ana akwete chichi ŵanganyao chikwatendekasya kuti akakulupilila
Soni pati jichisoomedwaga kukwao Qur’an ŵangasujudu
Nambo kuti achimakafili agamba kanila basi
Sano Allah ni jwaakuyimanya chenene yaakusonganganya ŵanganyao
Basi mwatagulilani ya ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope
Ikaŵeje aŵala ŵaakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone, akwete kupata ŵanganyao malipilo gangamala
Ngulilumbila liwunde lyalikwete ndondwa syekulungwa-kulungwa ni mwakwenda mwakwe
Ni Lisiku Lyeŵichidwe chilanga
Kwisa soni nkuŵichila ni nkuŵichilidwa umboni
Pamasile paŵalaniwe achinsyene masimbo
(Ga) moto wawakwete sasu (syejinji syakuukolechesya ni kwachomela ŵandu ŵakulupilila)
Pandema janti ŵanganyao ŵaliji ali chitamile mungulugulu mwakwe
Soni ŵanganyao ŵaliji aku ali nkulolela yaŵaliji nkwatenda ŵakulupilila (yakwachoma motoyo)
Ni nganauwona ulemwa uliose kwa jamanjao ikaŵeje ligongo lyanti ŵaliji nkunkulupilila Allah Jwamachili gakupunda, Jwakulapilildwa kusyesyene
Ajula Jwauli wakwe uchimwene wa kumawunde ni petaka, sanotu Allah pa chindu chilichose aŵele Mboni

Chisimu aŵala ŵaŵalagasisye ŵakulupilila ŵachilume ni ŵakulupilila ŵachikongwe (pakwachoma moto) kaneka ni ngatenda toba, basi akwete kupata ilagasyo ya Jahannama, soni akwete kupata ilagasyo yakutinisya
Chisimu aŵala ŵaakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone, akwete kupata Matimbe ga ku Mbepo gasikujilima cha pasi pakwe sulo. Kwalakweko nikupunda kwekulungwa
Chisimu kapeleche ka ilagasyo ka Ambuje ŵenu (Allah) kaŵele kaukali nnope
Chisimu Jwelepejo ni juŵatandisye (gumba iwumbe) soni ni jutachiyiusya-usya (kuigumba panyuma pakonasika)
Soni Jwalakwe ni Jwakululuka kusyene Jwachinonyelo chejinji
Nsyene Arish (Chindanda Chaulungu), Jwakuchimbichika kusyene
Jwakutenda yajukusaka mwangalepeleka
Ana jinyyiche abali ja mikutula ja asilikali
Achina Firiauna ni achina Samuda
Nambo kuti achimakafili ali mu kukanila basi
Sano Allah ni ŵasyungulile chakunyuma kwao
Nambo jalakweji ni Qur’an Jakuchimbichika
(Jilembedwe) mu Ubawo Wagosedwa
Ngulilumbila liwunde ni chakwisa chilo
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya chakwisa chilo
(Jalakwejo ni) ndondwa jakupowola (chipi ligongo lya kuŵala nnope)
Pangali mundu jwalijose ikaŵeje kwa jwalakwejo kwana nkunnolela (jwaakusunga itendo yakwe)
Basi achetelele mundu, ana agumbidwe kuumila ku chichi
Agumbidwe kuumila ku mesi gakusumbika
Gakopokaga kutyochela chilikati cha maupa ga n'gongo (wa ŵalume) ni maupa ga chidali (cha ŵakongwe)
Chisimu Jwalakwe (Allah) pakum'buchisya (kuwumi mundujo) aŵele Jwakombola kusyene
Lisiku lyasichionechela papaswela asili (syosope)
Ni ngasakola (mundujo) machili galigose namuno nkulupusyo
Ngukulumbila kwinani kwagwisyagwisya wula
Ni ngulilumbila soni litaka lyaliganjikaga (pakoposya mmela)
Chisimu jalakwe (Qur’aniji) gaŵele maloŵe gakulekanganya (chilikati cha yakuona ni yaunami)
Soni jalakweji nganijiŵa chindu chambenje
Chisimu ŵanganyao akuŵa ali nkutenda malindi (kwa Asilamu)
None ni ngwauchisya malindi (gaogo pangaapa ilagasyo chitema kuti alilechelele)
Basi, mwalechelesyani achimakafili, mwalechelelani panandipe (chaiwone)
Liswejesyani lina lya Ambuje ŵenu (Allah) Ŵapenani kusyene
Aŵala ŵaŵagumbile (chilichose) ni kuchikolosya
Soni Aŵala ŵaŵapimiile (chilichose mwachiichiŵeela) ni kuchijongolela (ku yaŵachipimileyo)
Soni Aŵala ŵaakumesya mopo
Ni kuwusyusya kuŵa wejumu ŵakupiililila
Chitunsoomesye ni ngan'diŵalila
Ikaŵeje yasachile Allah, chisimu Jwalakwe jukumanyililaga yakuonechela ni yayikasasisika
Ni chitun'jepepachisye litala lyakwalukangana (lyakutendela yambone)
Basi kumbusyani naga kumbusyako tikuŵe kwakamuchisya
Talikumbusye mundu jwaakun'jogopa (Allah)
Ni takuŵambale (mundu) jwakusakala nnope
Ajula jwatakajinjile ku Moto Wekulungwa
Soni ngachija kumpata chiwa mwalakwemo, nambo soni ngaaja kuŵa ni umi (wambone)
Pamasile paapundile mundu jwaliswejesye (ntima wakwe)
Ni akuŵa ali nkulikumbuchila Lina lya Ambujegwe (pakulikolanga) aku achiswaliji
Nambo ŵanganyammwe nkulongosya umi wa duniya
Kutendaga Akhera ni jambone nnope soni jandamo
Chisimu yalakweyi yili mu ikalakala yandanda
Ikalakala ya Ibrahima ni Musa
Ana jinyyiche abali ja chakuunichila (ŵandu ni yogoyo yakwe, jajili Kiyama)
Ngope sine lyele lisikulyo sichiŵa syakunyosyeka
Syasyapanganyisye masengo (gasambi ku duniya), syakupela (nikwaluka ku Akhera)
Sichijinjila ku Moto Wakupoteka nnope
Sichimwesyedwa mu tutumule jwansemule kusyene
Ngasakola ŵanganyao yakulya ikaŵeje miŵa janchongwe
Jangajimbasya soni jangakamuchisya ku sala
Ngope sine lyele lisikulyo sichiŵa m’chindimba
Ligongo lya masengo gakwe (gambone) sichiŵa syakusengwa
Ku Mbepo Japenani
Ngasisija kupikana kwalakweko yangali mate
Kweleko kwana tutumule jwakujilimaga
Kweleko kwana itengu yauchimbichimbi yenyakulidwe
Ni migawo jeŵichidwe (chilepe)
Ni misago jejalidwe mu ntungo wambone
Ni yakutandika yaofuofu yetandichidwe posepose
Ana ngakujiona ngamiya yajatite kagumbidwe
Ni liwunde yalyatite kanyakulidwe
Ni matumbi yagatite kasimichidwe
Ni litaka yalyatite katandichidwe
Basi kumbusyani, chisimu mmwejo ni nkukumbusya
Nganim'batu mmwe ŵakwakanganichisya ŵanganyao (chikulupi)
Ikaŵeje jwatagalauche (kuleka masengo gambone) ni kufulu (kuleka Usilamu)
Basi Allah tachinnagasya ni ilagasyo yekulungwa nnope
Chisimu Kukwetu pe ni kwakuujila kwao
Soni chisimu kuŵalanjidwa kwao kuli Nowe
Ngukulumbila kumasikusiku
Ni ilo likumi (yandanda yamwesi wa Mfungotatu)
Ni (indu yayili) yiŵiliyiŵili kwisa soni (yayili) chimochimo
Ni chilo ndema jachikuŵigula
Ana mu yalakweyi ngaŵa mwana kulumbila kwakwanila, kwa jwakwete lunda
Ana nganinyyiona yaŵatite Ambuje ŵenu kaape ipotesi ŵanya Adi
Ŵa ku Irama; achalewulewu mpela misaati
Ŵanganagumbidweje ŵane ŵanti chisawu ŵanganyao mu ilambo (ine)
Ni ŵanya Asamuda ŵaŵaliji nkusokola maganga pachiŵata (chakuŵilanjikwa Wadi Qura kuŵa majumba gao)
Kwisa soni Firiauna nsyene ichili (yakulimbanganyichisya uchimwene wakwe)
Aŵala ŵana kusumbaga mpika mu ilambo (pakusakasya)
Ni ŵatupiye mwalakwemo kuwatanganya
Basi Ambuje ŵenu ŵapungulile ŵanganyao mitundu ja ilagasyo (yakupoteka nnope)
Chisimu Ambuje ŵenu aŵele Ŵang'unulila (masengo ga ŵandu, mwanti chachalipila mwaakupanganyichisya)
Sano mundu ndema jaakun'dinga Ambujegwe pakunchimbichisya ni kumpa chindimba, basi akasatiji: “Ambuje ŵangu anjimbichisye (ligongo une nijwakuŵajilwa kupata yeleyi).”
Nambo ndema jaakun'dinga pakunnandiyichisya lisiki lyakwe, akasatiji: “Ambuje ŵangu anjalwisye.”
Ngwamba! Nambo kuti ngankwatendelaga yaukoto ŵanache ŵawina
Soni ngankuchisyanaga yaagaliisya masikini
Ni nkulyaga chipanje chamalekwa kalye kakutunduka
Ni nkuchinonyelaga soni chipanje kachinonyele kakupelenganya nnope
Ngaŵa (mŵankutendelamo)! Ndema jalichisyajidwa litaka syajidwe-syajidwe
Ni kwika Ambuje ŵenu (Allah kukwiilanya magambo), Achimalaika ali ndandanda
Ni kwikanajo lyele lisikulyo Jahannama! Lyele lisikulyo mundu tachikumbuchila (yaŵapanganyisye), nambo ana kuchinkamuchisya chichi kwele kumbuchilako
Tachiti (pakuligamba): “Nkongwene! Bola ngalongosye (yambone yakungamuchisya) pa umi wangu (walelo uno).”
Mwanti palyele lisikuli, pangali jwampaka apeleche ilagasyo mwatachipelechela (Allah)
Soni pangali jwampaka ataŵe mwatachitaŵila (Jwalakwe)
E mmwe antima ŵakutulala
Wujilani kwa Ambuje ŵenu n'di ŵakusengwa ni kunonyeledwa
Jinjilani mwikuga lya achikapolo Ŵangu
Soni jinjilani ku Mbepo Jangu
Nguulumbila awu musi (wa Maaka)
Soni mmwe (Muhammadi ﷺ) tinchiŵa ŵakundisyidwa (kuputa ngondo) mu wele musiwu
Ni ngullumbila soni nangolo ni uŵelesi wajuŵeleche
Chisimu pamasile patun'gumbile mundu m’matabu
Ana juganichisya yanti pangali ŵampaka ankombole (kumpa ilagasyo)
Jukuŵecheta (mwakutwanga kuti): “Njonasile yipanje yejinji (kuti Usilamu usilale).”
Ana juganichisya kuti pangali ŵaakun'bona
Ana nganitun'gumbila meso gaŵili (gajukulolela)
Ni lulimi kwisa soni ngomo siŵili (syajukuŵechetela)
Ni tun’jongolele matala gaŵili (lyambone ni lyakusakala, kuti jusagule lyajukusaka)
Ana pakwete pajujesile litala lyamwitumbi (lyalikam’bikasye ku Mbepo)
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya litala lyamwitumbi
(Litala lyamwitumbi nimasengo gambone nambo gakunonopa, mpela): gopola kapolo
Kapena kupeleka yakulya palisiku lyasala
(Kumpa) jwawina jwapaulongo
Kapena masikini jwaluwunduwundupe (ligongo lyakulaga nnope)
Soni nikuŵa (nkutola yakulyajo) jumpepe mwa aŵala ŵaakulupilile, ni kulimbikasyanaga ya kupilila soni ni kulimbikasyanaga ya kutendelana chanasa
Ŵanganyao niŵandu ŵakun'dyo (ŵali ŵambone)
Nambo ŵandu ŵaagakaaniile ma Ȃya Getu ŵanganyao niŵandu ŵakunchiji (ŵali ŵakusakala)
Kwaŵanganyao kuchiŵa kwana Moto Wakuunichila ni kutika (wangali pakopochela)
Ngulilumbila lyuŵa ni lilanguka lyakwe
Ni mwesi ndema jaukulikuya (lyuŵalyo)
Ni muusi ndema jaukulilosya palangulangu
Ni chilo ndema jachikuliunichila (kuti likaoneka)
Kwisa soni liwunde ni Juŵalitaŵile (mwakulitalichisya)
Ni litaka ni Juŵalitandiche (mwakulijaasasya)
Kwisa soni ntima ni Juŵaukolosisye
Basi ni jwaumanyisye yakusakala yakwe ni yambone yakwe
Pamasile paapundile jwauswejesye (ntima wakwe)
Soni pamasile papelelwe jwautwinyichisye (ntima wakwe mu sambi)
Ŵaakaaniile ŵanya Asamudu ligongo lyakusumba mpika kwao
Ndema jajwalipeleche jwakusakalilwa jwao (kuulaga ngamiya)
Basi Ntenga jwa Allah (Swaleh) ŵasalile kuti: “(Aji ni) ngamiya ja Allah, sano ngasin'jikanyaga kumwa mesi (palisiku lyakwe)
Nambo ŵankaaniile nikujiulaga; basi Ambuje ŵao ŵajonasile ligongo lya chileŵi chao; niŵalandenye pachonasikocho
Soni jwangajogopa yakuichisya yakwe
Nguchilumbila chilo ndema jachikuunichila (chilichose ni chipi chakwe)
Ni muusi ndema jakukulanguka
Ni Ajula (Allah) Jwagumbile chachilume ni chachikongwe
Chisimu itendo yenu iŵele yakulekangana-lekangana
Sano mundu jwaakutola (petala lya Allah) ni kuŵa niwoga (wakun'jogopa Jwalakwe)
Ni kulupilila yambone nnope (yatakalipidwe ligongo lyakutola)
Basi chitun'jepepachisye litala lyakwalukangana (lyakutendela yambone)
Nambo mundu jwachatende ubayili ni kuliona kusichila
Ni kanila yambone nnope (yaakajiile kuipata akatole)
Basi chitun'jepepachisye litala lyausito (lyakutendela yakusakala)
Soni ngasichija kunkamuchisya chipanje chakwe ndema jagwila (ku Moto)
Chisimu Kukwetu nikwachili chongolo
Soni chisimu Uwwe ni twachinsyene Akhera ni Duniya
Basi nguntetela ya Moto waukolela (mwamachili)
Ngaaja kuwujinjila ikaŵeje jwakusakalilwa nnope
Ajula jwaakuŵa nkukanila ni kusyulula
Ni takaŵambasyidwe nao mundu jwawoga kusyene (wakun'jogopa Allah)
Ajula jwaakutola chipanje chakwe pakuliswejesya
Soni pangali kwa jwalakwe jwalijose jwaŵantendele yaukoto yaikuŵa ili nkuusyidwa
Ikaŵeje (jukutola) pakusachilila Ngope ja M’mbujeegwe (Allah) Jwapenani kusyene (kuti jukajione ku Akhera)
Ni juchija kusengwa
Nguulumbila nsana
Ni chilo ndema jachikutulala
Ngananneka Ambuje ŵenu (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) soni nganam'benga
Soni chisimu umi wambesi uŵele wambone nnope kukwenu kupunda wandanda
Soni tachija kumpa Ambuje ŵenu (yambone) ni tinchisengwa
Ana nganansimana n'di ŵawina nikumpa liwuto lyambone
Soni ni ŵansimene n'di ŵangachimanya chongoko (jajili Qur'an ni malamusi ga Dini) nikun'jongola
Ni ŵansimene soni n'di ŵakulaga nikunsichilisya
Sano mwanache jwawina basi ngasimunchima
Nombe soni jwakuŵenda basi ngasimunkalipila
Soni chindimba cha Ambuje ŵenu (Allah) basi chisimbani (pakutogolela ni kutenda yambone)
Ana nganitunsapangulila (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) chidali chenu (pakumpa utume)
Ni tuntuusile nsigo wenu (wausito wa kalungusye ka utenga, pakun’jepepachisya kalungusye kakwe)
Awula (nsigo wakwe) wawalumbisye n'gongo wenu
Ni tunnyakuliile kusaalidwa kwenu
Basi chisimu pakuli kunonopa pana kwepepala
Chisimu pakuli kunonopa pana kwepepala
Sano pati mmalisyisye (masengo genu), basi limbichilani (kutenda ibada)
Soni kwa Ambuje ŵenu pe (Allah) basi sachililani (ukoto Wakwe)
Nguulumbila nkuju ni nzaituni
Ni litumbi lya Sinai
Kwisa soni awu nsinda (wa Maaka) wantunjelele
Chisimu pamasile patun'gumbile mundu mu kagumbidwe kambone nnope
Kaneka nitukum'busyaaga kuŵa jwapasi kwapunda ŵapasi wosope (pa uchekulu wakulepela nao kutenda yambone)
Ikaŵeje ŵandu ŵaakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone (ali ŵachilimbanganile), basi akwete kupata ŵanganyao malipilo gangamala
Ana panyuma (pa kuimanya yele) nichichi chikuntendekasya kanila ya malipilo (ga pa Kiyama)
Ana Allah nganaŵa Nkwiilanya chenene (magambo) kwapunda akwiilanya wosope
Soomani mu lina lya Ambuje ŵenu (Allah) ŵaagumbile
Agumbile mundu kuumila mu chipande chamyasi jekamatane
Soomani! Soni Ambuje ŵenu ni Ŵantuka kusyene
Aŵala ŵaajiganyisye (kulemba) ni chakulembela
An'jiganyisye mundu yaŵalekaga ngaimanya
Yakuona! Chisimu mundu akuŵaga jwakusumba mpika (pa kulikwesya)
Ligongo lyakuliona kusichila
Chisimu kwa Ambuje ŵenu pe (Allah) ni kwakuujila
Ana mum'bweni ajula jwaakuŵa nkunkaanya
Kapolo (jwa Allah) ndema jajukusaka kuswali
Ana nkuyiona uli najuŵaga (Muhammadi ﷺ) juli pachongoko
Kapena jukulamula ya woga (wakun'jogopa Allah)
Nambi nkuyiona uli naŵaga (Abujahalio) akukanila ni kusyulula
Ana ngaakumanyilila yanti Allah akwaona (yaakutenda)
Ngwamba! Chisimu naga ngaakuleka, chiitwawuta umbo syapewuwo (pakwaponya ku Moto)
Liwuwo lyakwe lyaunami soni lyakulemwa
Basi ŵaaŵilanje ŵandu ŵakwe (kuti ankamuchisye)
Nowe chitwaŵilanje Azabaniya (asilikali ŵa ku Moto)
Ngwamba! Mmwe ngasimunkunda jwalakwejo, nambo nsujuduji (kuswali) ni n’diŵandichisyeje (kwa Allah)
Chisimu Uwwe tujitulwisye jalakwe (Qur'aniji) m’Chilo Chakuchimbichika
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya Chilo Chakuchimbichika
Chilo Chakuchimbichikachi chiŵele chambone nnope kupunda myesi jakwana sausande
Achimalaika akasatulukaga pamo ni Nsimu (Jibulilu) mu Chele (Chilochi) kwa lisosa lya M’mbuje gwao, kwisa kulondesya chindu chilichose (pakuchiŵika mu mpango wakwe)
Ntunjelele-tunjelelepe! Chele Chilocho, mpaka kumasikusiku

Ŵandu achimakafili kutandila achinsyene chitabu (Ayuda ni Akilisito) kwisa soni ŵakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu), nganaŵa alekangene (ni ukafili wao) kwikanila ndema ja chayichilile chilosyo chakuonechela palangulangu
(Jwali) Ntenga (Muhammadi ﷺ) jwakuumila kwa Allah jwaakusooma (Qur’an jajili mu) ikalakala yakuswejesyedwa
Mwalakwemo mwana malamusi gagoloka

Chisimu Allah akupeleka chanasa kwa Ntume (Muhammadi ﷺ), nombe nao soni Achimalaika (akum’bombelaga chanasa Ntumejo ﷺ). E jenumanja ŵankulupilile! Mum’bombelani chanasa jwalakwe ni kum’bombela soni ntendele

Ni nganalamulidwa ikaŵeje yanti an'galagatileje Allah mwakunswejechesya dini Jakwe pakupendechela ku Uujika Wakwe (nikutalikangana nayo isanamu), nikuti ajimicheje Swala mwakolosya ni kutolaga Zaka, soni jalakwejo ni dini jagoloka

Chisimu ŵandu ŵaakanile (dini ja Usilamu); kutandila achinsyene chitabu (Ayuda ni Akilisito) kwisa soni ŵakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu), chakaŵe m’moto wa Jahannama, chakaŵe ŵandamo mwalakwemo. Ŵanganyao ni iŵumbe yakusakala nnope
Chisimu ŵandu ŵaakulupilile nikutendaga yambone, ŵanganyao ni iwumbe yambone nnope

Malipilo gao kwa Ambuje ŵao chigakaŵe Matimbe Gandamo gasikujilima cha pasi pakwe sulo. Chakaŵe ŵandamo mwalakwemo kwa yaka ni yaka. Allah tachanonyela (pakwapochela masengo gao gambone), nombe nao tachinonyelwa Najo (pamalipilo gataachaapa). Yalakweyo ni yamundu jwatan'jogope M'mbujeegwe (Allah)
Pandema jalichitenganyika litaka nichisikinya chakwe chamachili
Ni kwisa koposya litaka misigo jakwe jausito (ichindu yayaliji nkati mwakwe, mpela malilo ni mitapo jambiya)
Ni kwisa kuŵecheta mundu (mwawoga soni mwakusimonga kuti): “Litite uli (litaka, ana Kiyama jiyiche?)”
Lyele lisikulyo (litaka) lichiŵecheta abali syakwe syosope (sya indu yayatendekwele pachanya pakwe yambone kapena yakusakala)
Ligongo lyanti Ambuje ŵenu tachililamula lyalakwelyo (kuti liŵechete)
Lyele lisikulyo ŵandu tachipwilingana ali m'mikutula jakulekangana-lekangana kuti akaalosye masengo gao
Basi jwatapanganye chambone chausito wanti chisawu lunyilili, tachija kuchiona
Nombe soni jwatapanganye chakusakala chausito wanti chisawu lunyilili, tachija kuchiona
Ngusilumbila hachi syasikuwutuka sili nkupumasika
Ni syasikoposya moto mu ikotwa mwakwe (pakuwutuka m’maganga)
Ni syasikwagungumuchila amagongo kumasikusiku
Nikututumya palakwepo luwundu lwejinji
Nikulijinjilila palakwepo likuga (lya amagongo)
Chisimu mundu kwa Ambujegwe (Allah) juŵele jwakanila (ukoto waakumpa)
Soni chisimu jwalakwe jukuŵichila umboni pa yalakweyo (kupitila mu itendo yakwe)
Soni chisimu jwalakwe pakuchinonyela chipanje juŵele jwakupelenganya nnope
Ana ngajukumanyilila pandema jaichikoposyedwa yaili m’malembe
Nikwisa kwilochesya papaswela yaili m’mitima
Chisimu lyele lisikulyo M’mbuje gwao (Allah) tachamanya abali syosope (syakwamba yaŵapanganyaga ŵanganyao)
Chagunda ntima (Kiyama)
Ana chagunda ntima nichichi
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya chagunda ntima
Lyele ni lisiku (lya Kiyama) lyachachiŵa ŵandu (sakalaalii!) mpela mapuluputwa gakusapalala
Nombe matumbi gachiŵa (nkuwululuka) mpela litonji lyetyosye mbele
Sano mundu jwachiukasitope n'diingo wakwe (wa yambone, nikwepepala yakusakala)
Basi jwalakwejo takaŵe mu ndamo jakusengwasya
Nambo mundu jwachiukajepepale n'dingo wakwe (wa yambone, ni kusitopa yakusakala)
Basi liuto lyakwe ni ku Hawiya
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya jele (Hawiya)
Wele ni Moto Wakoocha nnope
Kumpele chipaka kusonganganya (ya duniya mwampikisano kuleka ganisya ya Akhera)
Mpaka nkwikanila kwaula ku malembe (n'di m'bwile)
Ngwamba! Chinchiika kumanyilila
Soni ngwamba! Chinchiika kumanyilila
Ngwamba! Ingaŵe mwamanyililaga umanyilisi usyesyene (nga nganin'jijilikaga ni ya duniya)
Chisimu chene chinkauone Moto Waukali
Soni chinkauone kusyene ni liso lyakusimichisya
Soni lyele lisikulyo tinkawusyidwe kusyene ya chindimba (chaŵampele pa duniya)
Ngujilumbila ndaŵi
Chisimu chene mundu ali nchasiko (ni kupelelwa)
Ikaŵeje aŵala ŵaakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone, ni kulimbisyanaga ya (kuya ichindu) yakuona, ni kulimbisyanaga soni yakupilila
Ipotesi ni yakwe jwalijose jwakwasogoda ni kwachembulusya ŵandu mwakwamumunya
Ajula jwaachisonganganyisye chipanje nikuchiŵalanjilaga (ndema ni katema)
Akuganichisya kuti chipanje chakwecho chichintendekasye kuŵa jwandamo
Ngwamba! Chisimu chene takaponyedwe ku Hutwama
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya Hutwama
Wele ni Moto wa Allah wachikolelele (wakuteketulanya chilichose chakuponyedwamo)
Awula wachiuŵa nkukwelela ku mitima
Chisimu walakweo uchaunichila ni kwaakutika ŵanganyao (kwakusoŵa pakopochela)
(Chachiŵa) m’makongwa getandaliche chanchilewu (mwanti ngasakombola kupuluputa)
Ana nganinyyiona yaŵatite Ambuje ŵenu (Allah) pakwajonanga achinsyene ndembo (ŵaŵayikaga kugumula Likaaba)
Ana nganagatenda malindi gao kuŵa gakusokonechela
Ni ŵatumichisye ŵanganyao ijuni mikutula-mikutula
Yaliji nkwaasoma ni maganga gelongo lyejoche (ni moto wa ku Jahannama)
Niŵatesile kuŵa mpela masapi gagalilidwe (ni inyama ni kulukulidwa)
(Ŵajonasile achinsyene ndembo) kuti ajendelechele Makuraishi
Panyendele jao jamaulendo ga chuku (kuja ku Yemeni) ni chawu (kuja ku Shami kumalonda mwantunjelele)
Basi an'galagatileje M'mbuje jwa aji Nyumba (ja Likaaba)
Ajula jwaŵapele yakulya ligongo lyasala, ni kwaŵambasya ku woga
Ana mum'bweni ajula jwaakukanila ya malipilo (ga pa Kiyama)
Basi jwele ni ajula jwaakuntutanga mwanache jwawina
Soni jwangachisya yagaliisya masikini
Basi ipotesi niyao ŵandu ŵakuswaliji
Aŵala ŵanya ŵaakuŵa ali nkusikwanjila swala syao
Aŵala ŵanya ŵaakuŵa ali nkutenda ndola
Ni akuŵa soni ali nkukanya yaakamuchisya (pannango, mpela liŵago, chipula, lituli ni yine)
Chisimu Uwwe tumpele (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) Kauthara (lusulo lwa ku Mbepo)
Basi mwaswalilani Ambuje ŵenu (Allah) nikusikita (inyama yakur’bani yakupelechela mbepesi Kukwakwe ngaŵaga kwa akumasoka)
Chisimu jwaakum'benga mmwejo ni jwali jwakatika (upile wakwe ni kusalidwa kwakwe)
Jilani: “E jenumanja achimakafili!”
“Ngangalagatila chinkuchigalagatila (kunneka Allah).”
“Nombe ŵanganyammwe nganim'ba mun'galagatile (Allah) jwangun'galagatila (kutendaga n'di mu ukafili pemo).”
“Nombe une soni nganimba nachigalagatile cham'bele n'di nkuchigalagatila ŵanganyammwe.”
“Nombe ŵanganyammwe nganim'ba mun'galagatile (Allah) jwangun'galagatila (kutendaga n'di mu ukafili pemo).”
“Jenumanja nkwete dini jenu (jagalagatila isanamu) une none ngwete dini jangu (jakun’galagatila Allah).”
Ndema jachiyiche chikulupusyo cha Allah ni kuwugula (Maaka kuŵa m’makono mwa Asilamu)
Ni kwaona mmwejo ŵandu ali nkwinjila mu dini ja Allah mikutula-mikutula
Basi (jele ndemajo) luswejesyani lumbili lwa Ambuje ŵenu, ni kwaŵenda chikululuko. Chisimu Ŵalakweo aŵele Ŵakupochela nnope toba
Gajonasiche makono ganagaŵili ga Abu Lahabi, nombe nao ajonasiche
Ngaija kwakamuchisya ipanje yao atamuno yaŵapanganyisye (mpela ŵanache ŵaŵaŵeleche)
Takajinjile ku Moto waukwete malamba (gakulapuka)
Niŵankwao ŵakwe ŵaŵaliji nkutwichila sasu (syamiŵa nikuntejelaga Muhammadi ﷺ mwakupita)
Nnukosi mwao (ŵele ŵakongweo) chimukaŵe mwana litondolo lyamiŵamiŵa (lyakwalagachisya nalyo)
Jilani: “Jwalakwe ni Allah Jumpepe.”
“Allah pe ni jwakun'jegama.”
“Nganaŵeleka soni nganaŵelechedwa.”
“Soni nganakola jwakulanda najo ata jumo.”
Jilani: “Ngulijuya mwa M’mbuje jwa kumasikusiku.”
“Ku yakusakala yaŵaigumbile.”
“Ni ku yakusakala yachilo ndema jachikwinjila chipi.”
“Ni ku yakusakala ya (asaŵi) ŵaakupepela mu iwundo (pakuloga).”
“Ni ku yakusakala ya jwalitima ndema jajukutenda litima.”
Jilani: “Ngulijuya mwa M'mbuje jwa ŵandu.”
“Nchimwene jwa ŵandu.”
“Nnungu jwa ŵandu.”
“Ku yakusakala ya nkusongona (pakuunyenjelela ntima yakusakala), jwakuujiilila ni kuliisisa (naga nsyene ntimao juli junkolasile Allah).”
“Ajula jwaakusongonaga m’mitima mwa ŵandu.”
“Jwakuumila m’majini ni mu ŵandu.”
